column1: conley wayne guy| mr. conley wayne guy
column6: 2015 at the johnson city medical center following an extended illness. a native of carter county
column7: tn he was the son of the late raymond and lela pierce guy. mr. guy was a retired roofer
column8: truck driver and school bus driver. he was a member of true gospel baptist church. he loved woodworking and making picture frames and he loved the outdoors. survivors include his wife
column17: tn; nine grandchildren; three great-grandchildren; a step-daughter
column21: william burrow and henry burrow; roan mountain
column22: tn; ten step-grandchildren; several step-great-grandchildren; one brother
column28: r. c. and tim guy. several nieces and nephews also survive. a service to honor the life of mr. conley wayne guy will be conducted at 3:00 p. m. saturday
column30: 2015 in the sunset chapel of hathaway-percy funeral and cremation services with rev. dean presnell officiating. music will be under the direction of mr. johnny palmer. the family will receive friends at the funeral home from 1:00 3:00 p. m. on saturday prior to the funeral service or at the residence at any time. upcoming events. visitationjun 13. 1:00 pm - 3:00 pm hathaway-percy funeral and cremation services101 east f street. elizabethton
